strings.string: The playlist is currently empty.[CR][CR]Use the context menu to[CR]add items to the playlist
This file is stacked, select the part you want to play from.
[B]CONFIGURE APPEARANCE SETTINGS[/B][CR][CR]Change the skin Set language and region Change file listing options[CR]Set up a screensaver
[B]CONFIGURE VIDEO SETTINGS[/B][CR][CR]Manage your video library Set video playback options Change video listing options[CR]Set subtitle fonts
[B]CONFIGURE MUSIC SETTINGS[/B][CR][CR]Manage your music library Set music playback options Change music listing options[CR]Setup song submission Set karaoke options
[B]CONFIGURE PICTURE SETTINGS[/B][CR][CR]Set picture listing options Configure slideshows
[B]CONFIGURE WEATHER SETTINGS[/B][CR][CR]Set three cities to collect weather information
[B]CONFIGURE NETWORK SETTINGS[/B][CR][CR]Setup control of XBMC via UPnP and HTTP Configure file sharing[CR]Set internet access options
[B]CONFIGURE SYSTEM SETTINGS[/B][CR][CR]Setup and calibrate displays Configure audio output Setup remote controls[CR]Set power saving options Enable debugging Setup master lock
[B]CONFIGURE SKIN SETTINGS[/B][CR][CR]Setup the SLik skin Add and remove home menu items[CR]Create quick links to media and addons
[B]CONFIGURE ADD-ONS[/B][CR][CR]Manage your installed Add-ons Browse for and install Add-ons from xbmc.org[CR]Modify Add-on settings
[B]FILEMANAGER[/B][CR][CR]Manage your system files Copy, Move, Rename, Delete files and folders on your system[CR]Orginize your Hard Drive
